jobDetails.title: Account Manager Display Ad Sales
jobDetails.description:
Basic Qualifications

·         BA/BS degree in marketing, business or related field

·         5+ years of experience in advertising, media sales.

·         Is someone with a good sense of how the mobile / digital ecosystem in India is shaping up, and keeps herself updated of developments in the digital industry

·         High level Communication and presentation skills

Responsibility:

  • Working with all the major Digital Ad Agencies & Ad- Networks
  • Work with the advertising agency & the design team to develop & plan various creatives in Online Display Space, Print, SMS, E-Mailers, etc.
  • Make sales presentations to key decision makers, effectively selling the capabilities, credentials and project methodologies.
  • Responsible for acquiring new accounts and growing existing accounts to full potential, generating maximum revenue on a long-term basis.
  • Manage and cultivate a pipeline of business sales opportunities
  • Identifying, pitching and closing ad sales deals with agencies and advertisers

Profile Fit

 

 The desired profile is of someone with 5 to 8 yrs in Digital Media Sales or Mobile Ad Sales with digital media companies / ad networks like TOI, HT, Network 18, ET etc...
jobDetails.sourcingTips:
2-8 yrs of experience in advertising, digital marketing ad sales.

 

For Mumbai location only female candidate are required.

  • Working with all the major Digital Ad Agencies & Ad- Networks
  • Work with the advertising agency & the design team to develop & plan various creatives in Online Display Space, Print, SMS, E-Mailers, etc.
  • Make sales presentations to key decision makers, effectively selling the capabilities, credentials and project methodologies.
  • Responsible for acquiring new accounts and growing existing accounts to full potential, generating maximum revenue on a long-term basis.
  • Manage and cultivate a pipeline of business sales opportunities
  • Identifying, pitching and closing ad sales deals with agencies and advertisers.

 The desired profile is of someone with 5 to 8 yrs in Digital Media Sales or Mobile Ad Sales with digital media companies / ad networks like TOI, HT, Network 18, ET etc..

company.name: DailyHunt
company.about:
Over 90 million people in India who love and use Dailyhunt (formerly Newshunt) to read News, Books and Magazines in 12 languages. Dailyhunt brings to you the largest collection of regional language news & books from the world.
Are you passionate about solving mobile-first, real-user problems at scale? Do you look forward to touching lives of millions of users?
It?s really the people that make Dailyhunt the kind of force it is. We hire people who are smart problem solvers & take ownership. We favor ability over experience.
We strive to maintain an open culture mostly associated with startups - one in which everyone is a hands-on contributor and feels comfortable sharing ideas and opinions.
Literally everyone in the team is genuinely invested in making their product better. One which they and members of their families use and feel proud of, everyday.

jobDetails.title: Hospitality Partnerships- BD Manager
jobDetails.description:
Builds HolidayIQ’s market position by locating, developing, defining, negotiating, and closing business relationships with hospitality partners.

Business Development Manager Job Duties:

  • Leverages strong network in luxury hospitality to deliver barter event deals
  • Sells internally developed hospitality event concepts successfully
  • Identifies trendsetter ideas by researching industry related events
  • Locates or proposes potential barter deals by contacting potential hospitality partners
  • Screens potential deals by analyzing synergies, deal requirements, potential
  • Closes partnerships by coordinating requirements and priorities at both ends
  • Protects organization's value by keeping information confidential
  • Updates industry knowledge by maintaining a strong networking calendar
  • Enhances organization reputation by accepting ownership for accomplishing new and different requests; exploring opportunities to add value to job accomplishments
  • Has minimum 6-7 years work experience
  • Has held hospitality industry Marcomm roles
  • Has recent sales and marketing experience
    Skills and Qualifications:
  • Strong network in hospitality across major metros. Closing Skills, Motivation for Sales, Imagination, Self starter, Market Knowledge, Presentation Skills, Energy Level, Meeting Sales Goals, Professionalism.
    Business Development Manager Soft Skills:
  • Perceptive, Driven, Target oriented, Able to work in a team, Natural inclination towards transparency, desire to grow and take on more beyond core areas.

company.name: HolidayIQ
company.about:
When a holiday idea seems elusive and a travel epiphany doesn't seem likely, let your fellow travellers show you the way. Browse through top hotels and destinations as suggested by millions of HolidayIQ.com Travellers, read about their hotel stay and holiday experiences, and plan your perfect vacation. 
HolidayIQ.com is India?s first & largest holiday information portal powered by our thriving Indian traveller community & experts; enabling travellers to discover, plan holidays and share holiday experiences. HolidayIQ.com gives you highly customised, rich information and insights on places, hotels, sightseeing and transport made uniquely relevant for you through what we call the science of holidays. It?s not rocket science but close enough!!

company.name: CarTrade
company.about:
CarTrade.com is one of India's leading online auto marketplace providing buyers and sellers a structured platform for transacting in new and used vehicles. Since its inception in 2010, we have expanded our offerings across India with a strong network of more than 4000 dealers. Currently, over 4 million unique consumers visit CarTrade.com every month and avail of its features. CarTrade.com's business can be divided into two parts: CarTrade.com, the consumer portal where the users can visit to buy and sell used/new cars and CarTrade Exchange, the dealer portal which helps them manage their business operations.

What makes CarTrade.com unique are its offerings and world class technology. Some of the unique features include used car price information, certified used cars, on road dealer prices and expert reviews that empower our buyers and sellers to choose the most suitable vehicles at the most affordable prices. Additionally, we also provide information related to the automobile industry and the latest automotive news. Our expert views and reviews of exciting upcoming models in the market guide and help buyers choose the best option.

We're proud of our sincere and continuous efforts, both for car buyers, sellers and the other people who want to know more about the automotive industry in India. So whether you're a first-time visitor, a frequent site user, an avid auto enthusiast, a job seeker or a journalist working on a story, we hope you'll find what you're looking for.

jobDetails.title: Junior Python Developer
jobDetails.description:
• Expert in Python, with knowledge of Django(Python web framework).
  • Familiarity with some ORM (Object Relational Mapper) libraries.
  • Basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3.
  • Good understanding of server-side templating.
  • Strong unit test and debugging skills.
  • Understanding of accessibility and security compliance.
  • Knowledge of user authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments.
  • Understanding of fundamental design principles behind a scalable application.
  • Familiarity with event-driven programming in Python.
  • Understanding of the differences between multiple delivery platforms, such as mobile vs desktop, and optimizing output to match the specific platform.
  • Able to create database schemas that represent and support business processes.
  • Understanding of the threading limitations of Python, and multi-process architecture.
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools (such as Git, Mercurial or SVN).
jobDetails.skills: Git, Python, server side templating, Django

Have you got working experience with a start-up?

company.name: Care24
company.about:
Health problems never give a prior warning. They simply strike when you least expect. We have seen our loved ones struggle post-surgery, being bed ridden or in chronic pains. We cannot replace you but we support you by providing the right care at the right time. We ensure your peace of mind by taking away the emotional stress during that period. Our expert medical services are personalised, cost-effective and reliable. 

We offer world class care at home through our 100% background verified caregivers which include: 
Nurses(ANM, GNM, Bsc)
Attendants, and
Physiotherapists
Care24 is the brainchild of three IIT alumni- Vipin, Abhishek and Garima. We have been serving in Mumbai since December, 2014 and have helped 1000+ people heal at home.

jobDetails.title: Senior Digital Planner
jobDetails.description:
Role: Sr. Planner that is the heart of the new business development team

Must have: Digital experience, experience in running new business pitches

 

ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Ability to think 360 (vs. just digital).
  • Leads and participates in strategy development initiatives for clients.
  • Understand and articulate the real problem the client is trying to solve – beyond the stated problem
  • Establish clear and measurable objectives
  • Create a deep understanding of the target audience; continuously be using best practices and research to understand target audience behavior
  • Coordinate with Research Team to inform brief and agency work, as and when required.
  • Drive understanding of emerging digital platforms and ability to leverage for the client.
  • Be the digital evangelist in the agency and client organizations.
  • Understanding key emerging digital trends and identifying opportunities to leverage them in service of the client.
  • Providing value to clients by delivering strategic thinking that enables OgilvyOne to provide work that is relevant and distinctive
  • Continuously be driving digital knowledge excellence within the agency
  • Works with the account manager to effectively craft inspiring creative briefs and brief creative staff.
  • Analyzes data and develops implications and recommendations.  
  • Monitors and interprets cultural and social trends relevant to client business.
  • Have an eye for new business opportunities and the ability to think on the feet.

 

REQUIREMENTS

  • At least 2 years should have been spent working on the digital consumer
  • Must have hands on experience on digital
  • Curiosity, observant & self-driven
  • Easy to get along with and collaborative
  • Understands digital media
jobDetails.sourcingTips:
• Must have: Digital experience, experience in running new business pitches
  • Atleast 2 years experience on working on the digital consumer
  • Must have hands on experience on digital
  • Focus on digital agencies
jobDetails.skills: Strategy, Digital Evangelist, Planning, Digital Media Planning, Digital Media

company.name: Ogilvy Neo
company.about:
Find you. Grow you. Keep you. This is the Ogilvy talent management mantra.

At Neo we believe in nurturing talent. We want to find the best candidates who can be innovative industry leaders at all levels, grow their careers and keep them as part of the Neo family.  

Growing and keeping great talent is a two-way street. We expect the best performance from our employees and in return provide a number of extra perks and benefits. Internal training, a mentor program, corporate service day, a very generous package of time off, retail discounts and pet insurance are just a few things offered.

Neo has a rich culture rooted in the history of Ogilvy while we maintain the entrepreneurial energy of a start up. People are our greatest resource and we truly want employees to have a well-balanced life. Work hard, play hard.

jobDetails.title: Relationship Manager
jobDetails.description:
Job Description:

  • Maintaining and developing relationships with new customers via meetings, telephone calls & emails.
  • Visiting potential customers for new business.
  • Negotiating the terms of an agreement and closing sales.
  • Gathering market and customer information and providing feedback on future buying trends.
  • Representing our organisation at trade exhibitions, events & demonstrations.
  • Advising on forthcoming product developments & discussing special promotions.
  • Liaising with our customers to check on the progress of existing implementations.
  • You are also expected to be involved in identifying new markets & business opportunities.
  • Recording sales and order information.
  • Reviewing your own sales performance, aiming to meet or exceed targets.

Competencies:

  • Strong bent towards direct sales.
  • Should possess good communication & presentation skills,
  • Prior experience in Yellow Pages, Direct Selling, Space Selling and/or Concept Selling industry preferred,
  • Background is pharmaceuticals/healthcare industry is a bonus.
jobDetails.sourcingTips:
- at least 2 years of experience in concept selling

- Preffered from Healthcare industry

- Willing to work as an Individual contributor

- Willing to work with Start-up

company.name: Lybrate
company.about:
Lybrate is passionate about helping Doctors deliver better patient care. Our products are designed to make managing clinics a breeze. We empower Doctors with critical patient information anytime, anywhere so that they can make better decisions for patients. We pride ourselves for being super focused on the basics - Ease of use, honest pricing, great service, and respect for trust that Doctors place in us. 

Calendar: Lybrate offers a hassle-free online calendar to doctors. With the Lybrate calendar, doctors can manage appointments, distinguish consultant appointment and send SMS to patients who have missed appointments. 
Treatment: Lybrate enables doctors to record and search prescriptions, billing information and schedule future appointments on a single screen. Doctors can also easily search patient treatment history. 
Reminders: Lybrate offers options for appointments and payment reminders SMS to patients.

company.name: Taskbucks
company.about:
Based out of Gurgaon (NCR) we are creating India's largest mobile workforce. 
Think 100+ million smartphones + youth looking for predictable supplement income. 
You do TASKS and we give you BUCKS : That's pretty much what TaskBucks is. 
We curate tasks and open them on our platform, users complete these tasks using their smartphones and earn some really cool bucks. 

In under 10 months TaskBucks Android app has more than 5 million installs, paid over a half a million dollars to TaskBucks users and worked with top startups and marquee brands. 

We are aggressively looking for programming ninja's to be a part of our technology team. 
If you are an Android or iOS developer, php/Java developer, backend or system engineer : Go straight to our careers page. 

Why Work With Us: 
You will be working in a flat structure with no bureaucracy 
Ownership of the product, you make and re-make rules. Basically we will back you as long as you get shit done. 
Good salary comes with fun (we have a pool table and an X-box) too. 

If you want to work with a high growth start-up and make a difference in millions of people's lives, then TaskBucks is the place!

company.name: RedBus
company.about:
Ibibo Group Private Limited, runs redBus.in India's largest online bus ticketing web site. We have the largest network of bus operators in our listings (1800+ and growing) and satisfied customers bookings upto 80,000 tickets a day through our various channels. We provide over 67000+ (and growing) live routes across India.redBus also hosts sizeable bus seat inventory from state road transport corporations. 

redBus has been recognized as an innovative organisation that revolutionized the bus travel industry and was Awarded as top 50 Global innovators by Fast Company - an American business publication. The redBus mobile App recently won the Global Mobile Innovation in Travel for the year 2014 from Eye For Travel. 

redBus is a part of the ibibo Group which is an integral part of the Naspers Group. The Naspers Group was founded in 1915 and has presence in over 130 countries globally

  • Leading the team for timely product releases
  • Good understanding of various technologies and being able to come up with solution to address the problem at hand

Our mobile apps are at the heart of the company and we wish to keep innovating on that front to provide the best user experience to our end users. That is why we are looking for a smart and talented Android developer to join our tech team at Juggernaut. We are in the process of finishing up with our Android and iOS apps and post launch we need someone who can focus on building new features.
 
Our team is highly talented and motivated towards building a world class product backed up with great technology at its core and we are looking for more such people to join us in this exciting journey. Everyone at Juggernaut has complete ownership of what they build and we except everyone joining us to build the product as they own baby. Here are the key requirements:
 
          Skills Required
  1. At least 4 year of experience in android development for consumer internet products
  2. Very strong aptitude and reasoning
  3. Ability to break complex problems into parts and solve them
  4. Must be able to communicate thoughts clearly to the team
  5. Previous startup experience is a plus

  • Should maintain partnerships
  • Needs to process data
  • Should know an opportunity in the market 

Roles And Responsibilitie 

  • Drives the Meta Clicks numbers for Hotels on HolidayIQ.Drive relationship and daily working with HolidayIQ’s Meta search partner, working to increase number of online bookable hotels, OTA options etc
  •  Analyse data to figure out opportunity areas like lower conversion rates, fewer online hotels, seasonality trends, price benchmarking and work with teams to action of these insights
  •  Plans the budget for spending on performance marketing in line with revenues forecasted
  •   Build and manage relationships with OTAs to understand their POV and build HolidayIQ as key affiliate for them
  • Maintain and develop partnerships with Hotel Chains through high levels of service in order to strengthen the customer relationship around content listing, review generation etc
  • Enhance existing partnerships with OTAs, Hotel Chains by providing analytics, insights etc and building HolidayIQ as the GO-TO travel partner for them
  •  Competitive strategy and our ability to differentiate, right to win and OTA/Hotel influence. Keep tab on market share on a monthly basis.
  •  Pro-actively identify opportunities to increase the revenue opportunity via Chat/Calls etc
  • Assist with sales and marketing activities such as B2B Marketing, Identifying relevant trade shows, events and conferences
  • Communicate customer requirements and/or schedules to internal teams in a timely manner to promote efficient response process
jobDetails.sourcingTips:
• 1.       Minimum 4-7 years of proven BD/Account Management/Operational experience.

    2.       MBAs preferred but not mandatory

    3.       Start-up work-ex preferred

    4.       Must have strong analytical mindset and dataoriented decision making

    5.       Understanding of Digital Marketing space preferred

    6.       Must be a self-starter/Go-Getter 6. Good working knowledge of MS Office tools (PPT, EXCEL, WORD)

    7.       Excellent team player Excellent communication skills. Ability to deliver presentations confidently to senior management personnel Need to hire Vs Contract/Outsource Permanent Role

    8.       Very strong track record of B2B sales and relationship management. Should have been in this for atleast 2 years of the total work-ex.

    Strongly preferred 2 years in an OTA in Hotels Contracting, Digital Marketing, Core Business oriented general manager profile. OTA experience should be in hotels/stays, can look at exception for outstanding candidates only. Can make role exception for a strong b2b oriented product manager in OTA who wants to shift to general management
jobDetails.skills: SEM, Digital Marketing, B2B Marketing, Account Management, Business Development, Media Buying

company.name: HolidayIQ
company.about:
When a holiday idea seems elusive and a travel epiphany doesn't seem likely, let your fellow travellers show you the way. Browse through top hotels and destinations as suggested by millions of HolidayIQ.com Travellers, read about their hotel stay and holiday experiences, and plan your perfect vacation. 
HolidayIQ.com is India?s first & largest holiday information portal powered by our thriving Indian traveller community & experts; enabling travellers to discover, plan holidays and share holiday experiences. HolidayIQ.com gives you highly customised, rich information and insights on places, hotels, sightseeing and transport made uniquely relevant for you through what we call the science of holidays. It?s not rocket science but close enough!!

  • Shares great relatiobships with agencies like  Isobar, reprise media, resultrix,performix, groupm, Omd, Zenithoptimedia, dentsu, Carat media

     

  • Relationship with Ad networks, publishers a plus

  • Ad sales need to be a must

  • The Job involves anchoring all the digital media sales activities for a region.
  • This involves actively pitching to brands and presenting them with creative brand solutions.
  • Needs to have and be able to drive lots of contacts in the industry.
  • Needs to know and quickly get connected with all major media buying agencies to be able to liason with them on a daily basis. Owns revenue targets and pushes for them actively.
  • Will be needed to push internal stakeholders in the company on new inventory, solutions etc. to grow the business.
  • Will need to be able to straddle sales of large bundled offerings and not typical banner campaigns. 
  • If you have previous worked in Media buying companies like a groupM , Mediacom etc.  or worked in media sales for internet companies like time internet, ebay, sulekha, commonfloor etc. then you should definetly apply!!

jobDetails.title: Head Of Media Sales
jobDetails.description:
• The candidate needs to have contacts in digital media and sales media.
  • Needs to have done individual sales in both media and digital sales.
  • Needs to have knowledge of travels

  • We are looking for experienced business leader who has worked in digital media ad sales. The candidate should have great relationship with advertising agencies and brands and should be able to open doors and conversations started with his experience. Having worked in the travel domain is an added plus. A mix of agency experience is a plus, having run media sales for a brand and owning revenue targets is a must have. Being involved in creative content sales is a plus.

  • The Job involves anchoring all the digital media sales for the company across all regions. This involves actively pitching to brands and presenting them with creative brand solutions.
  • Needs to have and be able to drive lots of contacts in the industry.
  • Needs to know and quickly get connected with all major media buying agencies to be able to liason with them on a daily basis.
  • Owns revenue targets and pushes for them actively. Should be comfortable with owning growth numbers of 20-50% MoM.
  • Will be needed to push internal stakeholders in the company on new inventory, solutions etc. to grow the business. Will need to be able to straddle sales of large bundled offerings and along with traditional digital campaigns.
  • Needs to also anchor all media operations ensure 100% inventory utilization.
  •   Needs to own the month on month revenues generated from the Media sales as a channel. Needs to be able to sell various propositions to media houses and partners.
  •   Travel is a fun proposition and HolidayIQ occupies an interesting space with the consumer as a travel brand. Hence the need is for a creative person who can think up and sell solutions to media houses and partners. Will have to go beyond just looking at traffic based visibility deals. The need is to create multipliers through interesting solutions 
  • Champions ad-space, properties and campaigns internally to help drive revenue further.
  •  Create discipline in inventory utilization in regular “run the business” campaigns.
  •    Ensure strict discipline in collections and a healthy cash flow

company.name: CarTrade
company.about:
CarTrade.com is one of India's leading online auto marketplace providing buyers and sellers a structured platform for transacting in new and used vehicles. Since its inception in 2010, we have expanded our offerings across India with a strong network of more than 4000 dealers. Currently, over 4 million unique consumers visit CarTrade.com every month and avail of its features. CarTrade.com's business can be divided into two parts: CarTrade.com, the consumer portal where the users can visit to buy and sell used/new cars and CarTrade Exchange, the dealer portal which helps them manage their business operations.

What makes CarTrade.com unique are its offerings and world class technology. Some of the unique features include used car price information, certified used cars, on road dealer prices and expert reviews that empower our buyers and sellers to choose the most suitable vehicles at the most affordable prices. Additionally, we also provide information related to the automobile industry and the latest automotive news. Our expert views and reviews of exciting upcoming models in the market guide and help buyers choose the best option.

We're proud of our sincere and continuous efforts, both for car buyers, sellers and the other people who want to know more about the automotive industry in India. So whether you're a first-time visitor, a frequent site user, an avid auto enthusiast, a job seeker or a journalist working on a story, we hope you'll find what you're looking for.

jobDetails.title: Senior PHP Developer
jobDetails.description:
• We are looking for enthusiastic candidates with good logical programming abilities and having good expertise at PHP, MySQL and JavaScript.
  • Should be expertized using MVC architecture and demonstration skills in tips and tricks of the platform.
  • You will be working with high traffic, high load website
  • You will have to handle high complex data  structures, and also learn using NGINX, REDIS, and MongoDB.
  •  Building data-driven REST APIs, services & platforms using the LAMP stack.
  • Performance Enhancement
  • Improve and enhance architecture
  • Improve Website Search Engine
  • Boost and configure server for larger audience
jobDetails.skills: PHP, JavaScript, MySQL, Redis, MVC Architecture, Nginx, MongoDB

company.name: SportzInteractive
company.about:
We are Sportz.

Sportz Interactive has revolutionised the sport experience for fans across consumption points and geographies. If you?ve followed sport online in India, chances are, you?ve interacted with us! Hope you enjoyed it!

We offer cutting-edge sports technology solutions, data, digital services and everything a sports fan would want to enhance the sport-viewing experience. While our matchcentres, data feeds and live scoring is part of the all leading publishers and portals, our digital services are creating immersive and engaging experiences across new media platforms.

As a key member of the STATS Global Network - the world's largest sports information services group - SI's impressive range of products and services have benefitted an enviable list of customers around the globe.
